attributes.action: Petition for Greater Promotion of REAL cider!
attributes.additional_details:
Real cider producers suffer each year due to the mass media promotion of non real cider producers such as Strongbow, Magners, Bulmers, Gaymers etc.

These ciders are not considered REAL cider- they have ingredients added to them and are often made from apple concentrate, as opposed to real apples.

We would like the government to assist REAL cider producers, often low-scale independent producers to equal the playing field!
